tool_description: API that takes in any english sentence and returns the sentence with correct grammar
name: CorrectMyGrammar
title: CorrectMyGrammar

api_list.name: Correct Sentence
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to correct the grammar of given sentences
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://correctmygrammar.p.rapidapi.com/correct"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "correctmygrammar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://correctmygrammar.p.rapidapi.com/correct"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "correctmygrammar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
